document.title: Greeks: The False Sense of Entitlement
document.abstract: Is your organization on national moratorium? Do you have a Real vs. Paper problem? Do you think your organization runs the yard? Do you feel you are entitled to certain privileges because of the three letters across your chest? This program is designed to identify the problems related to these issues and seek solutions. NPHC organizations can move forward only by acknowledging the problems that are created through a false sense of entitlement.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
